在家工作：COVID-19 期间对父母的健康有利有弊？ 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行期间远程办公对父母的总体健康和心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Work-from-home-a-mixed-blessing-for-parents-health-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Work-from-home-a-mixed-blessing-for-parents-health-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c5902b1-cfd9-4e63-a617-40b29374b582 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 06:48:00 -0500 Work from home: a mixed blessing for parents' health during COVID-19?

科学表明青少年需要更多的睡眠。那么为什么后来开学就这么难呢？这座城市的高中课程开始得很早，以至于有些孩子早上 5:30 就上公交车了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Science-says-teens-need-more-sleep-So-why-is-it-so-hard-to-start-school-later.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Science-says-teens-need-more-sleep-So-why-is-it-so-hard-to-start-school-later.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7458b810-fad6-4b1b-8cd9-eaf3627bbf92 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:57:38 -0500 Science says teens need more sleep. So why is it so hard to start school later?
随着跨性别“难民”涌入新墨西哥州，候补名单不断增加今年夏天，索菲亚·马查多 (Sophia Machado) 收拾好行李，离开俄勒冈州的家，搬到了新墨西哥州的阿尔伯克基，她姐姐就住在那里，马查多听说那里的居民对跨性别邻居更加友好，而且更容易获得性别肯定的医疗服务。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/As-transgender-e28098refugeese28099-flock-to-New-Mexico-waitlists-grow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/As-transgender-e28098refugeese28099-flock-to-New-Mexico-waitlists-grow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=094899a2-3788-4ecb-b36a-621bdc0e7166 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:53:45 -0500 As transgender ‘refugees’ flock to New Mexico, waitlists grow

研究探讨父亲心理健康与儿童行为、认知问题之间的联系虽然母亲的压力、焦虑和抑郁对儿童行为和认知发展的作用已广为人知，但人们对父亲的心理健康与儿童发展之间的联系知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-explores-link- Between-paternal-mental-health-and-behavioral-cognitive-problems-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-explores-link- Between-paternal-mental-health-and-behavioral-cognitive-problems-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c691d892-730c-4e2f-803c-ec23238b737d Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:30:00 -0500 Study explores link between paternal mental health and behavioral, cognitive problems in children
尖端“精准医学”显示出改善糖尿病护理的巨大潜力一个国际科学家联盟在对全球该领域现状的全面评估中报告称，尖端的“精准医学”在推进不同形式糖尿病的诊断、治疗和最终预防方面具有巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Cutting-edge- precision-medicine-shows-great-pottial-to-improve-diabetes-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Cutting-edge- precision-medicine-shows-great-pottial-to-improve-diabetes-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cbc79dd-0dc3-4f16-acff-ef3accaa813a Mon, 06 Nov 2023 01:26:00 -0500 Cutting-edge 'precision medicine' shows great potential to improve diabetes care
